column2: This character is of considerable stature, taller than most.
This character is nimbler and quicker than most.
This character is sharp, possessing excellent senses and intuition.
This character can naturally use both hands with equal skill. As a result, they are more efficient in whatever they do, whether it is swinging swords or writing letters.

This erratic character was born with a scatterbrained temperament. They tend to forget things easily, get distracted too easily, or both. This behavior may be endearing to some, but to others it is an annoyance.
This character is blind and cannot see.
This character is mute and cannot talk.
This character is deaf and cannot hear.
This character is blessed with good luck.
This character is so unlucky that it could be called curse.
This character has a silver tongue, capable of sweet-talking anyone.
This character understands the basics of combat, but is sloppy and inexperienced, but still better than average.
This character has received training in the art of combat. While no master, they can hold their own in a fight.
This character possesses an incredible talent for battle and swordplay, that is outmatched only by few chosen individuals.
This character is one of the greatest warriors in the world, favored by gods and dreaded on the battlefield.
The uneducated buffoon is unable to pay attention to one thing for more than a few moments.
The Jack of All Trades, as the saying goes, is master of none.
The Polymath is well versed in all fields of study, yet often overshadowed by those with more specialised education.
The Sage is a trove full of knowledge that few can match, efficiently able to fill any council position.
This character is addicted to drugs.
This character is a skilled alchemist pursuing the many mysteries of his trade.
This character likes to create and thinker with things - no matter is it smiting, carving or engraving.
This character has deep hatred for worms and great passion for fish, and what better way there is to unite both than fishing.
This character views humans as the superior race.
This character views all races as equal.
This character is an avid player enjoying dice, cards or pretty much any game involving luck, and can make risky moves when they are worth it.
This character is someone that can be reasoned with, and that always carefully considers benefits and drawbacks before making any move.

This character is an elf, one of the elder races inhabiting the world from time before humans appeared. Elves a beautiful, delicate, and very long-lived race. They have long pointed ears, slender, agile bodies, and no canine teeth. They came to the Continent on their white ships around a thousand years ago.

This character is a halfelf, an offspring of both a human and and elf. Halfelves are similar to humans in many ways, including their lifespan, the only thing they have from elves are their pointy ears.

This character is a dwarf, one of the elder races inhabiting the world from time before humans appeared. Dwarves are short and sturdy, possessing great beards. Dwarves are great miners, craftsmen, warriors, and bankers.
This character is a halfdwarf, an offspring of both a human and a dwarf. Halfdwarfs are more sturdy then humans and taller than dwarves, their beards are also less remarkable.
This character is a halfling, one of the elder races inhabiting the world from time before humans appeared. Halflings are short and with knack for commerce, their feet are covered with hair.
This character is the offspring both a human and a halfling. Halfhalflings are similar to humans in most ways, except being noticeably smaller and their feet are less covered in hair.

This character is a gnome, one of the elder races inhabiting the world from time before humans appeared. Gnomes are a very small race usually around two to three feet tall. They are easily distinguished from halflings and dwarves by their long pointy noses. Gnomes are revered for their immense knowledge of chemistry and metallurgy, especially by dwarves.
This character is the offspring both a human and a gnome. Halfgnomes are quite similar to humans despite their unique pointed noses and a significantly more feeble build. They are still quite witty.

This character is a dryad, one of the elder races inhabiting the world from time before humans appeared. Dryads are exclusively female, using other races to mate, they also have uncanny skill with bows.
This character is a human, the newest race. Humans are in all ways unremarkable, but are the most numerous race in the world.
This character represents an unowned territory - ruins, unowned towers or otherwise uninhabited holdings.
This character is a dragon who can take a human shape.
This character is a leader of a group of non-human rebels fighting against the discrimination of non-humans.
This character has a talent for magic, but without proper training is a danger to others and himself.
This character is learning to become a full-fledged sorcerer.
This character is a skilled Sorcerer educated in the use of magic.
This character is born with incredible innate magical abilities that few can match, even among the most learned sorcerers.
This character is a scholar of the forest with deep understanding of nature's workings.
This character is a monster-slayer for hire, and has undergone extensive training and mysterious rituals.
This character appears in the books and/or the games
This character is counted among the greatest emperors, one under whose rule the Nilfgaard Empire will grow ever stronger.
This character is veteran of many battles.
This character has acquired much fame as a fearsome raider.
This nonhuman possesses the ability to have children.
This sorcerer is naturally able to reproduce or has overcome his inability to reproduce through other means.
This character has continued his education in one of the famous academies of the world.
This character has finished the prestigious Military Academy, a prerequisite to become a great general.
This character is embracing the thought that Emperor is more important then Sun.
This character is embracing the thought that Sun is more important than Emperor.
This character is descendant of Radovid, one of first three human kings and founder of Redania.
This character is descendant of Cerbin, one of first three human kings and founder of Cintra.
This character is direct descendant of Dezmod, one of first three human kings and founder of Temeria.
This character is direct descendant of Baldwin, the founder of Aedirn.
This character is direct descendant of Dagread, the founder of Kaedwen.
This character is direct descendant of Trojen, the founder of Kovir.
